Continuous Dehumidification Mode ensures the dehumidifier runs continuously and rapidly lowers room humidity to the minimum level. These three different functions enable the dehumidifier to solve more problems for you!
ã€ğˆğ§ğ­ğğ¥ğ¥ğ¢ğ ğğ§ğ­ & ğğ¨ğ«ğ­ğšğ›ğ¥ğ ğƒğğ¬ğ¢ğ ğ§ã€‘: Timer function allows you to set closing time as needed. Intelligent panel lock prevents accidental operation. Auto shut-off when water tank is full to prevent overflow. The washable filter for easy cleaning. Equipped with 4 universal wheel and 2 pull handles for easy mobility. Operates quietly at only 40 db, ensuring it doesn't disturb your daily life and rest!

Continuous drainage: Our dehumidifier comes with a drain hose, which can be easily connected to your dehumidifier's outlet for continuous drainage.
